nodes.text: 2T-DS was a droid member of the Bounty Hunters' Guild. 2T-DS served as Personal Assistant to the Associate Managing Director of Accounts, sometime during the tenure of Cradossk as the Guild's Head.

During his time as Personal Assistant to the Associate Managing Director of Accounts, 2T-DS had contributed to the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook. Titled "Employment Opportunities", 2T-DS's contribution to the handbook covered topics about how to go about receiving bounties, as well as groups and individuals whom post them.
Before joining the administrative team of the Guild, 2T-DS had secured 209 bounties, and had been among the Guild's top 10 money-earners for three consecutive years.
2T-DS was first mentioned in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett.
